about-heading: We Provide Best And Quality Gifts Box Product For You
home-about-description: We specialize in crafting high-quality and unique gift boxes tailored just for you. Our dedication ensures every product meets your needs with care and excellence.
testimonial: I was absolutely delighted with my order from Bloom Boutique! The bouquet of fresh, vibrant flowers not only brightened my day but also exceeded my expectations. The flowers were delivered on time, and the presentation was impeccable. This is by far the best online florist experience I've ever had.
special-gifts: Special Gifts Box For Your Love
description-one: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Nulla, libero.
combo-sets: Combo Sets Gift Box Up To 50% Off
description: Experience the timeless beauty of our floral collections, crafted to ease your worries and bring moments of joy. Each bouquet follows a delicate design, carefully chosen to satisfy even the most refined tastes. There’s no need to endure the ordinary when you can embrace the elegance and fragrance of flowers that speak to the heart. When life demands beauty, our flowers are here to meet that need.
regex-set-password: A password must be at least 8 characters long and include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character (#?!@$%^&*-).

account-created: Your account has been created succesfully!
order-successful-description: Your order has been placed successfully.
order-failed-description: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Q1: How can I place an order?
Q4: How can I track my order?
Q5: What is the return and exchange policy?
Q6: How can I track my order?
Q7: What payment methods do you accept?
Q8: Can I cancel or modify my order?
Q10: Do you offer discounts or promotions?
answer1: You can place an order by browsing products, adding them to your cart, and completing             the checkout process.
answer2: We accept credit cards, bank transfers, and cash on delivery.
answer3: Delivery usually takes 3 to 5 business days depending on your location.
answer4: Once your order is confirmed, you will receive an email with a tracking link.
answer5: You can request a return or exchange within 14 days of receiving your order, provided the product is in its original condition.
answer6: After placing your order, you will receive an email with a tracking number. You can also find it in your account under 'Orders'.
answer7: We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, and Apple Pay. All payments are secure and encrypted.
answer8: Yes, you can cancel or modify your order within 1 hour of placing it by contacting our support team.
answer9: You can return any item within 14 days of delivery. The product must be unused and in original packaging.
answer10: Yes, we regularly run promotions and offer discount codes through our newsletter and social media.
termsandconditions: By accessing and using our website, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions.
conditions1: Users must provide accurate information when registering.
conditions2: Unauthorized use of the site is prohibited.
conditions3: We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate policies.
descriptionprivacypolicy: We are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
police1: We collect information you provide during account creation.
police2: Your data is stored securely and is not shared with third parties without consent.
police3: You can request to delete your data at any time.
descriptionotherpolicies: Additional policies may apply to specific services or features provided on our platform.
deliveryanswer1: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Delivery takes between 3-5 business days depending on your location.
deliveryanswer2: We currently deliver to major cities and towns. Rural areas may experience longer delivery times.
deliveryanswer3: A flat shipping fee of $5 applies to all orders. Orders over $100 qualify for free shipping.
deliveryanswer4: If a delivery attempt fails, we will contact you to reschedule. Additional fees may apply for repeated failed attempts.
deliveryanswer5: We offer standard delivery, express delivery, and scheduled delivery options.
deliveryanswer6: Yes, same-day delivery is available in select cities for orders placed before 1 PM.
deliveryanswer7: Yes, we offer international shipping to selected countries with extended delivery times.
